summary: TRANSMISSION FAILURE AT LESS THAN 36,000 MILES ON CHRYSLER 2001 TOWN AND COUNTRY MINIVAN. HAD TAKEN VEHICLE IN ONE MONTH PRIOR FOR "SLIPPAGE" OF TRANSMISSION.  VEHICLE WAS RETURNED WITH NTF.  FAILURE WAS CATOSTROPHIC AND TRANSMISSION WILL BE REPLACED WITH REMANUFACTURED TRANSMISSION.  AS OF THE DATE OF THIS FILING, HAVE NOT RECEIVED MY CAR BACK FROM DEALERSHIP.  WAS FORTUNATE CAR FAILURE OCCURRED WHILE PULLING INTO GAS STATION AFTER A LARGE BANG HAD BEEN HEARD TO DETERMINE CAUSE OF FAILURE.
